title: As a Club Admin, I want permission roles added to the Club User Permission Screen
custom_preconds:
AC:

* The following categories (left column) and roles (drop down) will be added to the Club User Permission Screen:
** Rule 5
*** None
*** Rule 5 Club Viewer
** Minor League Insurance
*** None
*** Minor League Insurance Club Admin
*** Minor League Insurance Club Viewer
** International Drug Testing
*** None
*** Club Drug Testing Admin
*** Club Drug Testing Viewer
** EBIS Link
*** None
*** EBIS Link All Categories role
* The new roles should appear in alphabetical order with the already present roles

* The Individual Permission section of the screen should be collapsed by default
* Employee contract creator role will be added to all four employee contract features

title: As a Club Admin, I want the Professional Player Profiles role more visible on the user account screen
custom_preconds:
AC:

* The Professional Player Profiles feature will be moved into the first position on the user account screen
** The remaining features will continue to appear in alpha order
* The 'None' option will be removed from the Pro Player Profile feature
* Pro Player Club viewer will be the default permission for this feature

title: As a BOC Admin, I don't want Club System Admins to give their employees certain permissions
custom_preconds:
AC:

* On the Club User account screen, the follow permission roles will be disabled (grayed out) and will say (Contact BOC for permission) after the role name:
** Employee Contracts (Executive)
*** UEC (Executive) Admin
*** UEC (Executive) Viewer
** Employee Contracts (Front Office)
*** UEC (Front Office) Admin
*** UEC (Front Office) Viewer
** System Admin
*** System Club Admin
** Waivers
*** Waivers Club Admin

title: As a BOC Admin, I want users to receive email notifications when user permission changes are saved
custom_preconds:
AC:

* When a user's ebis account has its permissions updated and saved, ebis will send a notification to the BOC emails addresses indicated on the Email Utility (Permission Update notification)
* These emails will only be generated if a Club user is updating a users permissions
* The subject line of the email will read: "EBIS Account Permissions Updated"
* The body of the email will read:
** \[Updated Username]'s EBIS permission have been updated by \[Updating Username].
* There will be a Roles Added section:
** This section will list the names of any roles added to the account
* There will be a Roles Removed section:
** This section will list the names of any roles removed from the account

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the Email Utility updated to include permission update notifications
custom_preconds:
AC:

* Under the Email System Utility, the User Accounts section will be updated:
** The existing notification will be put under the header "New Account Approval"
** A new "Permission Updates" notification will be added
***  There will be a 'Send Notification' row under "Permission Updates" that allows users the enable or disable sending notifications to BOC (this is a BOC only notification, no Club user should be able to get these emails)
** Club Users will continue to not see this section
* There will be a new "Permission Updates" column added to the Recipients table
** Users will be able use checkboxes to indicate whether an email address should get emails when permissions are updated

!image-2022-03-17-11-54-24-263.png|width=200,height=183!

title: As a League Economics Admin, I want two new system values added to EBIS
custom_preconds:
AC:

* In the Thresholds portion of the System Values screen, there will be a new field "CBT Third Surcharge Threshold"
* In the dollars above base Tax Threshold ($M) the > $40 million row will be updated to $40 - $60
* In the dollars above base Tax Threshold ($M) there will be a fourth row for "> $60"
* In the General portion of the System Values screen, there will be a new field: "CBT Pre-Arb Bonus Pool"
** The field will appear after CBT Extended Benefits and before CBT Threshold

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see current year options in the player profile secondary header
custom_preconds:
AC:
 - There will be a new "Current Year Options:" field in pro player profile headers
 - The new field will be BOC only
 - Field will be formatted as "X/5"
  -- X will represent a running count of all the times the player has been optioned to the minors in the current season

title: As a BOC Admin, I want players being sent to Lineup Cards to be surface in ebis
custom_preconds:
AC:
 - There will be a new table below the MN Roster widget on the Rosters dashboard
 - The table will display the fields included in the Lineup Cards api:
  -- Player Name
  -- POS
  -- CLUB
  -- Roster Status
  -- Pending Roster Status (if available)
  -- MLS

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Advance Consent Letters removed from ebis
custom_preconds:
AC:
 - 2 Player Letters will be removed
 - 2 Blank Letters will be removed
 - Spanish versions of all will be removed

title: As a User, I want the OR waiver claim priority to be updated to account for prior claims
custom_preconds:
As per the new CBA OR waiver claim priority is now updated such that a club who has successfully claimed and been awarded a player since the prior spring training start date will drop to the end of the priority list regardless of their winning percentage.  Calculation of winning percentage is unchanged.

If all teams with claims on a player have a prior claim in the timeframe then the club with the lowest winning pct is awarded the player.

AC

* Update the OR waiver claim priority to account for clubs with prior OR claims being dropped to the bottom of the list
* If all clubs who have placed a claim on a player have a prior existing claim then the club awarded the player is the one with the lowest winning pct
* The process will wrap around to the prior year come January 1st 2023 - it will look back to spring training 2022 for claims up until spring training 2023, at which point the process will reset



!image-20220314-195637.png|width=494,height=146!

title: As a User, I want the waiver priority for claims to be updated to remove the league preference
custom_preconds:
As per the new CBA, waiver priority will no longer have a league preference, instead winning percentage will determine who wins on a claim.

Additional changes will be made to account for prior claims as well, covered with [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1216|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1216|smart-link] 

AC

* League is no longer used to determine waiver priority, instead winning pct is all that matters (lowest PCT is awarded the player)

title: As a User I want to remove the waiver period logic for secured OR waivers
custom_preconds:
As per the new CBA all secured OR waivers will last for seven days from when they were secured and then expire.  There is no longer a â€˜waiver periodâ€™ for which securing waivers lasts for the entire period.

AC

* Secured waivers last for 7 days before expiring
* This happens whether or not the player is on option

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Clubs limited to 7 Waiver Requests, per type, per bulletin
custom_preconds:
Currently, the system prevents club users from entering more than 7 total waiver requests per bulletin.  This rule should be updated to account for waiver type.

AC:
 - Clubs will be allowed 7 UR Waiver Requests per bulletin
 - Clubs will be allowed 7 OR Waiver Requests per bulletin
 - Attempting to go over 7 will result in a blocking error for Club User, overrideable warning for BOC User

title: As a BOC Admin, I want MN Roster Status to be checked when requesting OR Waivers on an Optioned Player
custom_preconds:
MN Roster status is not currently checked when an Optioned Player has OR waivers requested

AC:
 - If an Optioned player has OR waivers requested, the system will perform a check to see if the player is on the Military, Voluntarily Retired, Bereavement, Paternity, Restricted, Suspended, Disqualified, Ineligible, or Temporarily Inactive Lists
 - If the check fails, the system will return a hard error for Clubs and an overrideable warning for BOC:
  -- Text: Outright Waivers may not be requested on a player currently on an inactive list.  Please contact the BOC.
  -- Buttons: Ignore & Continue (BOC Only), Back
 - Submitting the reinstate from IL transaction will resolve this error (Pending Status is checked)

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the system to return a warning if a recently Outrighted player is DFA'd
custom_preconds:
AC:

* If a Designate for Release or Assignment transaction is submitted for a player previously claimed on OR Waivers more than 2 days ago, but within the last 7-days, the system will return the following warning:
** Text: â€œPlayer was recently claimed on Outright Waivers.  Please be aware that per MLR 8, a Club may not request Outright Waivers on a player claimed on Outright Waivers within 48 hours (if claim occurred from start of Spring Training through the end of the Championship season) or within 7 days (if claim occurred during the off season until the start of Spring Training) after the time of the claim.  This restriction does not apply if the player has spent at least one game on the Major League Active List after the waiver claim.â€�
** Buttons: Ignore & Continue, Back

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the system to return a warning if a recently Outrighted player has OR Waivers requested
custom_preconds:
AC:

* When the waiver date is during the season or spring training and an OR Waiver Request is placed on a player previously claimed on OR Waivers within the last 2-days, the system will return the message below as a hard error for clubs.  BOC can override this message
* When the waiver date is NOT during the season or spring training and an OR Waiver Request is placed on a player previously claimed on OR Waivers within the last 7-days, the system will return the message below as a warning with ignore & Continue/Back buttons
* Message:
** Text: â€œPlayer was recently claimed on Outright Waivers.  Please be aware that per MLR 8, a Club may not request Outright Waivers on a player claimed on Outright Waivers within 48 hours (if claim occurred from start of Spring Training through the end of the Championship season) or within 7 days after the time of the claim (if claim occurred during the off season until the start of Spring Training).  This restriction does not apply if the player has spent at least one game on the Major League Active List.â€�
** Buttons: Ignore & Continue. Back

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the system to return a warning about roster counts when a 60-Day IL placement is backdated
custom_preconds:
AC:
 - If a MJ 60-Day IL Placement tx is backdated any number of days, the system will return a warning:
  -- Text: "In order to backdate placement to the 60-day IL, Club must have been at 40 on the Reserve List at all times back to the date of placement." 
  -- Buttons: Ignore & Continue, Back

title: As a BOC Admin, I don't want IL Placements to be backdated more than 3 days
custom_preconds:
AC:
 - This story is to update all IL transactions to ensure they are all consistent with regards to backdating
 - No IL Placement, Major or Minor, may be backdated more than 3 days.
 - These errors will be hard errors for clubs, but overrideable for BOC Users

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Outrights updated to required attached Player's Consent
custom_preconds:
AC:
 - If an Major/Minor Outright transaction is created for a player with 5 or more years of MLS, an attachment with a label type of "Player's Consent" is required for submission
  -- Club users will get a hard error, BOC Users will get an overrideable warning

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Optional Assignments updated for 5+ players
custom_preconds:
The intent of this story is to mirror the logic of Outright Assignments

AC:
 - If an Optional Assignment transaction is created for a player with 5 or more years of MLS, there will be a "Received Player's Written Consent" checkbox on the transaction
  -- This checkbox is required for club users to submit
  -- BOC Users will get an overrideable warning if it left blank
 - An attachment with a label type of "Player's Consent" is also required for submission
  -- Club users will get a hard error, BOC Users will get an overrideable warning

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Recall updated to match Selection Logic
custom_preconds:
AC:
 - When a Recall transaction is submitted, the system will perform a check to confirm the player's pending (or current if pending is not populated) minor league roster status is Active or Pending Active
 - If the check fails, the system will return a hard error for clubs and an overrideable warning for BOC users
  -- The error message will match the Selection error

title: As a BOC User, I want a Player to have a Submitted MJC Prior to Selection to MJ Roster
custom_preconds:
AC:

* When a Selection to MJ Roster transaction is submitted for a player, the system will perform a check to see if the player has a MJC in Submitted state or greater
* If the check fails, the system will return a soft warning for Club and BOC users:
** Text: Player requires a submitted Major League contract to be selected to the Major League roster.  Please contact the BOC for help.
** Buttons: Ignore & Continue, Back

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Clubs to be required to receive approval prior to submitting a Reinstate from IL tx for a player with a concussion
custom_preconds:
Rules: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786706/10.+Reinstate+from+DL|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786706/10.+Reinstate+from+DL]

AC:

* When a Club user creates a Reinstate from Injured List transaction, Rule 10.03 in the provided rules doc will no longer be applied
* If the player was ever on the Concussion IL (across all tx on this IL chain), there will be a "Received MLB Pre-Approval" checkbox 
* This is required and must be checked in order for the club user to submit
* Existing requirements will remain unchanged:
** "Received Medical Director Approval" will continue to be required

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Clubs to be required to receive approval prior to submitting a 7-Day Concussion IL Placement
custom_preconds:
AC:
 - There will be a new "Received MLB Pre-Approval" checkbox added to the Place on 7-Day Concussion IL
 - This is required and must be checked in order for the club user to submit
 - Existing requirements will remain unchanged:
  -- "Received Medical Director Approval" will continue to be required
  -- "CDF Submitted" will continue to be required

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Clubs to create and submit Reinstate from Inactive List for
custom_preconds:
AC:
 - Reinstate from Inactive List will no longer be BOC Only (no longer ghosted out and "BOC Only" will no longer appear)
 - If the player is currently on the Major League Bereavement/Family Medical Emergency List or the Major League Paternity List, Club Users will be able to create a Reinstate from Inactive List transaction
  -- If the player is not on either of those lists, the Club user will get a blocking message instructing them to contact the BOC
 - There will be a "Received MLB Pre-Approval" checkbox on the Reinstate transaction
  -- This is required and must be checked in order for the club user to submit
 - Club users will be blocked from submitting the Reinstatement if the player has not passed the minimum amount of days (existing rules, confirm they are getting applied and blocking Club submission)
  -- Paternity List: 1 day
  -- Bereavement List: 3 Days

title: Slack integration for MLB transaction communications
custom_preconds:
As a Baseball Operations employee

I would like to be able to manage questions and requests from club users in a single channel on slack

So that I can reduce the amount of call volume and respond to club users more efficiently



Garrett has requested that we set up 31 new slack channels - one for each of the 30 major league clubs, and 1 for BOC. Any message posted by a club user in one of the club channels, including threaded messages, should automatically be copied and sent to the BOC channel so that BOC users can read all of these messages in a single place. Messages posted by BOC members in the club channels should _not_ be forwarded to the BOC channel.

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Clubs to be able to create and submit MJ Paternity List Placements
custom_preconds:
AC:
 - Place on Major League Paternity List will no longer be BOC Only
  -- Clubs will be able to select the placement from the Create New menu (it will no longer be ghosted out and "BOC Only" will no longer appear)
 - The transaction will have a "Received MLB Pre-Approval" checkbox
  -- This is required and must be checked in order for the club user to submit

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Clubs to be able to create and submit MJ Bereavement/Family Medical Emergency List Placements
custom_preconds:
AC:

* Place on Major League Bereavement/Family Medical Emergency List will no longer be BOC Only
** Clubs will be able to select the placement from the Create New menu (it will no longer be ghosted out and â€œBOC Onlyâ€� will no longer appear)
* The transaction will have a "Received MLB Pre-Approval" checkbox
** This is required and must be checked in order for the club user to submit

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Optioned Players on the MN 60 Day IL w/a Viral Infection to count against the 40
custom_preconds:
Description: In 2020, we updated the MN 60-Day IL so any Optioned player who was placed on that list with a Viral Infection would not count against the 40-Man Roster.

AC:
 - If an Optioned player is placed on the MN 60-Day IL with a Viral infection, he will continue to count against the 40-man roster and the count will not be impacted

title: As a BOC Admin, I want certain MN Transactions to appear on the MJ Transaction Bulletin
custom_preconds:
Description: Any transaction that affects the 40-Man Roster roster count should appear on the TX Bulletin.

AC:
 - If an *Optioned Player* is placed on one of the following MN Inactive Lists, an entry will appear on the daily MJ TX bulletin:
  -- Restricted List
  -- Disqualified List
  -- Suspended List (by Club)
 - If an *Optioned Player* is reinstated from one of the following MN Inactive Lists, an entry will appear on the daily MJ TX bulletin:
  -- Restricted List
  -- Disqualified List
  -- Suspended List (by Club)

title: As a User, I want to Print the SFD from the Transfer to MJ COVID IL transaction
custom_preconds:
The Transfer to MJ COVID IL Transaction will have an accompanying SFD, just like the other MJ IL placements

MJ Data Discovery:  https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786605/Transfer+Player+to+10+or+60-Day+DL

MJ 60-Day IL SFD:  https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786724/DL+-+Clipboard

Clipboard Notifications:  https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786724/DL+-+Clipboard

AC:
 - There will be a new SFD created for the Transfer to MJ COVID IL transaction
 - There will be a â€œ Received SFDâ€� checkbox added to the transaction
  -- The box will be disabled for Club users if an attachment with a label of "Standard Form of Diagnosis" is not attached.
 - The Reason for Placement field will be added to the SFD
 - A notification will be generated when a SFD is attached after the TX has been submitted (Message #6)
 - If 3 days have passed since the TX was submitted w/o a SFD being submitted, a notification will be generated  (Message #7)
 - This story should cover the esign process

title: As a BOC Admin, I want an SFD on the MJ COVID IL
custom_preconds:
The COVID IL Transaction will must have an accompanying SFD, just like the other MJ IL placements

MJ Data Discovery:  [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786601/Place+on+10+60-Day+DL|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786601/Place+on+10+60-Day+DL]

MJ 60-Day IL SFD:  [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786414/MJ+SFD+-+Place+on+10+Day+DL+Place+on+60+Day+DL+Layout|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786414/MJ+SFD+-+Place+on+10+Day+DL+Place+on+60+Day+DL+Layout]

Clipboard Notifications:  [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786724/DL+-+Clipboard|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786724/DL+-+Clipboard]

AC:

* There will be a new SFD created for the MJ COVID IL placement
* There will be a â€œ Received SFDâ€� checkbox added to the transaction
** The box will be disabled for Club users if an attachment with a label of "Standard Form of Diagnosis" is not attached.
* The Reason for Placement field will be added to the SFD
* A notification will be generated when a SFD is attached after the TX has been submitted (Message #6)
* If 3 days have passed since the TX was submitted w/o a SFD being submitted, a notification will be generated  (Message #7)
* This story will cover the esign process as well

title: As a BOC Admin, I don't want COVID IL to appear on the MN Transaction Bulletin
custom_preconds:
AC:

* There should be no mention of COVID IL on the MN Transaction Bulletin
* Placements should read: "Place on Injured List"
* Reinstatements should read: "Reinstate from Injured List"
* Transfer should read: "Transfer to Injured List"

title: As a BOC Admin, I don't want COVID IL to appear on the MJ Transaction Bulletin
custom_preconds:
AC:
 - There should be no mention of COVID IL on the MJ Transaction Bulletin
 - Placements should read: "Place on Injured List"
 - Reinstatements should read: "Reinstate from Injured List"
 - Transfer should read: "Transfer to Injured List"

title: As a User, I want rules to fire for Transfer to COVID IL (Minors) Transaction
custom_preconds:
Rules: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2411200574/24.+Transfer+to+COVID+IL

On Create:
16.03: The player must have a pending Minor League roster status of 7 Day IL, Rehab 7 Day IL, 60 Day IL, Rehab 60 Day IL

On Submit/On Approve:
16.05: The player must have a pending (or actual) Minor League roster status of 7 Day IL, Rehab 7 Day IL, 60 Day IL, Rehab 60 Day IL

Submit Updates:
16.12: If the player's pending (or actual) Minor League roster status is 7 Day IL, Rehab 7 Day IL, 60 Day IL, Rehab 60 Day IL, then set the player's pending MN roster status to COVID IL

Approval Updates:
16.20: If the player's pending Minor League roster status is 7 Day IL, Rehab 7 Day IL, 60 Day IL, Rehab 60 Day IL, then set the player's MN roster status to COVID IL

Note: Minor League Transaction Bulletin should use generic text, i.e. "Transfer to Injured List"

title: As a User, I want to Transfer a Player to the COVID IL (Minors)
custom_preconds:
Rules: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2411200574/24.+Transfer+to+COVID+IL

Wires:
 - https://w6h8fs.axshare.com/#p=place_on_covid_il__minor_&g=1
 - https://w6h8fs.axshare.com/#p=transfer_player_to_60-day_dl_1&g=1

AC:
 - There will be a new MN Injured List Transaction, "Transfer to COVID IL (Minors)"
 - Selecting this transaction from the Create New menu will load a new Transfer to COVID IL (Minors) tx, which will match the provided rules document
 - Will follow the existing layout for IL Transfers.  Injury Details section will follow layout of COVID IL (Minors) Placement.
 - There will be a Reason for Placement dropdown with the following values:
  -- Positive Test Result
  -- Close Contact
  -- Symptomatic
  -- Required Intake
  -- Other
 - If Other is selected, Comments become required 
 - There will be a â€œReceived Approval from Club Medical Staffâ€� checkbox
 - This is required and must be checked in order for the club user to submit
 - The transaction will have standard button options:
  -- Save
  -- Save and Run Rule Check
  -- Submit
  -- Cancel
 - The new transaction will be searchable
 - These placements will appear on player histories
 - Players placed on the MN COVID IL will not count toward Domestic Player Limit or the DSL Player Limit
 - There is no minimum period of time for the MN COVID IL
 - BOC will be notified on submission and be able to approve
 - BOC will subsequently be able to Reverse and Reverse and Suppress

title: As a User, I want rules updated for Transfer to COVID IL Transaction
custom_preconds:
Rules: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2411200551/15.+Transfer+to+COVID+IL

AC:

On Submit/On Approve:

8.04: The player's pending (or current if pending is not populated) MJ roster status must be 7 Day Concussion IL, Rehab 7 Day Concussion IL, 10 Day IL, Rehab 10 Day IL, 15 Day IL, Rehab 15 Day IL, 60 Day IL, Rehab 60 Day IL.

Submission Updates:

8.09: If the player's pending MJ roster status is Rehab 7 Day Concussion IL, Rehab 10 Day IL, Rehab 15 Day IL, Rehab 60 Day IL, then set their pending MJ Roster Status to Rehab COVID IL.
Approval Updates:

8.10: If the player's pending MJ roster status is 7 Day Concussion IL, 10 Day IL, 15 Day IL, or 60 Day IL, then set the player's pending MJ roster status to COVID IL.

Approval Updates:
8.21: Add entry to daily transaction bulletin using generic text "i.e. Transferred to Injured List"

title: As a User, I want to Transfer a Player to the COVID IL
custom_preconds:
Rules: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2411200551/15.+Transfer+to+COVID+IL

Wires:
 - https://w6h8fs.axshare.com/#p=place_on_covid_il&g=1
 - https://w6h8fs.axshare.com/#p=transfer_player_to_60-day_dl&g=1

AC:
- There will be a new MJ Injured List Transaction, "Transfer to COVID IL"
 - Selecting this transaction from the Create New menu will load a new Transfer to COVID IL, which will match the provided rules document
 - Will follow the existing layout for IL Transfers.  Injury Details section will follow layout of COVID IL Placement.
 - There will be a Reason for Placement dropdown with the following values:
  -- Positive Test Result
  -- Close Contact
  -- Symptomatic
  -- Required Intake
  -- Other
 - If Other is selected, Comments become required 
- There will be a â€œReceived MLB Approvalâ€� checkbox
  -- This is required and must be checked in order for the club user to submit
 - The transaction will have standard button options:
  -- Save
  -- Save and Run Rule Check
  -- Submit
  -- Cancel
 - The new transaction will be searchable
 - These placements will appear on player histories
 - Players placed on the MJ COVID IL will not count toward the 40-Man Player Limit
 - There is no minimum period of time for the MJ COVID IL
 - BOC will be notified on submission and be able to approve
 - BOC will subsequently be able to Reverse and Reverse and Suppress

title: As a User, I want Orgs to be prevented from having more than 15 players on the MN 60-Day IL at the same time
custom_preconds:
Rules:
 - Placement: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786750/15.+Place+on+60-Day+DL
 - Transfer: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786748/16.+Transfer+to+60-Day+DL

AC:
 - Placement: 15.12: Org may not have more than 15 players on MN 60-Day IL at one time
 - Transfer: 16.12: Org may not have more than 15 players on MN 60-Day IL at one time

AC:

 - On submit and approve, rules 15.12 or 16.12 respectively, will fire
 - If the rule fails, the following hard error will be returned for club users (it will be overrideable for BOC Users)
  -- BODY: No more than 15 players are allowed on the 60-Day IL (Minors) at any one time.  Please contact the BOC.
  -- Buttons: Ignore & Continue (BOC Only), Back
 - The number of players will be a constant and easily configurable, as it is expected to change

title: As a User, I want the MN Resinstate from IL transaction updated to account for Full-Season IL
custom_preconds:
Rules: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786741/20.+Reinstate+from+IL

Data Discovery:  https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786590/MN+Reinstate+from+DL

AC:
 - Players may not be Reinstated from the Full-Season IL until 10/15
 - "Reinstate From" field will read "Full-Season IL"

On Create/On Submit/On Approve
 - 20.03: The player must have a pending Minor League roster status of 7 Day IL, 60 Day IL, COVID IL, or Full-Season IL
 - 20.05: The player must have a pending Minor League roster status of 7 Day IL, 60 Day IL, COVID IL, or Full-Season IL

On Submit:
 - 20.13 If the player's pending (or actual) Minor League roster status is Full-Season IL, they may not be reinstated until 10/15
 - If this rule check fails, a hard error will be returned to club users (overrideable for BOC Users):
  -- Body: Player not permitted to be reinstated for the remainder of this season.  Please contact BOC.
  -- Buttons: Ignore & Continue (BOC Only), Back

Note: 10/15 Reinstatement date should be an easily configurable constant

title: As a User, I want rules updated for Transfer to Full-Season IL Transaction
custom_preconds:
Rules: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2409693423/23.+Transfer+to+Full-Season+IL

On Create:
 - 16.03: The player must have a pending Minor League roster status of 7 Day IL, Rehab 7 Day IL, 60 Day IL, Rehab 60 Day IL, COVID IL, Rehab COVID IL

On Submit/On Approve:
 - 16.05: The player must have a pending (or actual) Minor League roster status of 7 Day IL, Rehab 7 Day IL, 60 Day IL, Rehab 60 Day IL, COVID IL, Rehab COVID IL

Submission Updates:
 - 16.12: If the player's pending (or actual) Minor League roster status is 7 Day IL, Rehab 7 Day IL, 60 Day IL, Rehab 60 Day IL, COVID IL, Rehab COVID IL, then set the player's pending MN roster status to Full-Season IL

Approval Updates:
 - 16.20: If the player's pending Minor League roster status is 7 Day IL, Rehab 7 Day IL, 60 Day IL, Rehab 60 Day IL, COVID IL, Rehab COVID IL, then set the player's MN roster status to Full-Season IL

title: As a User, I want to Transfer a Player to the Full-Season IL
custom_preconds:
Rules: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2409693423/23.+Transfer+to+Full-Season+IL|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2409693423/23.+Transfer+to+Full-Season+IL]

Wire: [https://w6h8fs.axshare.com/#p=transfer_player_to_60-day_dl_1&g=1|https://w6h8fs.axshare.com/#p=transfer_player_to_60-day_dl_1&g=1]

AC:

* There will be a new MN Injured List Transaction, "Transfer to Full-Season IL"
* Selecting this transaction from the Create New menu will load a new Transfer to Full-Season IL, which will match the provided rules document
** Will follow the existing layout for MN IL Transfers (not COVID IL).  Transfer to 60 Day IL is provided
* There will be a "Received MLB Approval" checkbox
** This is required and must be checked in order for the club user to submit
* The transaction will have standard button options:
** Save
** Save and Run Rule Check
** Submit
** Cancel
* The new transaction will be searchable
* These placements will appear on player histories
* Players placed on the Full-Season IL will not count toward Domestic Player Limit or the DSL Player Limit
* Players on this list may NOT be reinstated during the Minor League season
* There will be a limit of 15 players on the Full-Season IL per ORG at any one time
* Players on this list may NOT be assigned on a rehab assignment
* BOC will be notified on submission and be able to approve
* BOC will subsequently be able to Reverse and Reverse and Suppress
* When the user submits the Full-Season IL placement, the system will return the following message:
** Title: Warning
** Body: Player not permitted to be reinstated or assigned on a Rehabilitation Assignment for the remainder of this season.
** Buttons: Continue, Back

title: As a User, I want Rehab Assignment Rules Updated for Full-Season IL
custom_preconds:
Rules: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786739/17.+Rehabilitation+Assignment|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3786739/17.+Rehabilitation+Assignment]

AC:

* Players on the Full-Season IL may not be placed on a Rehab Assignment
* On Create, Rule 17.04 will fire
* When the rule fails, the following message will be returned:
** Player not permitted to be assigned to a Rehabilitation Assignment for the remainder of this season.
* Back

title: As an LRD user, I want to manually modify MJC Total Salary
custom_preconds:
Currently we allow for manually modifying the AAV of an MJC via database update and through setting the â€˜AAV_MODIFIED_FLAGâ€™ to true.  Once that is set, AAV is no longer calculated when saving the contract, the entered value remains. 

We want to expand that flag to also cover the total guaranteed dollar value for the contract.

Checking the flag will prevent total guaranteed salary from updated upon saving the contract.

This is needed for the following two players:

Jackie Bradley - Total Guaranteed should be 22,997,505 - AAV should be 11,498,753

Nolan Arenado - Total Guaranteed should be 260,000,000 - AAV should be 32,500,000

Wire: [https://w6h8fs.axshare.com/#p=place_on_covid_il&g=1|https://w6h8fs.axshare.com/#p=place_on_covid_il&g=1]

AC:

* There will be a new MJ Injured List Transaction, "Place on COVID IL (Major)"
* Selecting this transaction from the Create New menu will load a new MJ COVID IL placement transaction, which will match the provided data discovery and rules document
* There will be a Reason for Placement dropdown with the following values:
** Positive Test Result
** Close Contact
** Symptomatic
** Required Intake
** Other
* If Other is selected, Comments become required
* There will be a â€œReceived MLB Approvalâ€� checkbox when tx is created by Club Users
** This is required and must be checked in order for the club user to submit
* The transaction will have standard button options:
** Save
** Save and Run Rule Check
** Submit
** Cancel
* The new transaction will be searchable
* These placements will appear on player histories
* Players placed on the MJ COVID IL will not count toward the 40-Man Player Limit
* There is no minimum period of time for the MJ COVID IL
* BOC will be notified on submission and be able to approve
* BOC will subsequently be able to Reverse and Reverse and Suppress

title: As a BOC Admin, I want Club Users to Be Prevented from Duplicating a MJC that is in TC or greater
custom_preconds:
AC:

* When club user clicks save on a new MJC, the system will perform a check to see if that player already has a MJC with the same start year in Terms Confirmed state or greater
* If a MJC meeting that criteria is found, the system will return the following hard error:
** Title: Error
** Body: Another contract with the same start year already exists in Terms Confirmed state or greater for this player.  Please contact the BOC, 
** Button: Back

title: INC0182851 - New Major League Inactive List - Administrative Leave List
custom_preconds:
Received from: [jeff.pfeifer@mlb.com|mailto:jeff.pfeifer@mlb.com]
Recipients: [ebissupport@mlb.com|mailto:ebissupport@mlb.com][,Paul.Mifsud@mlb.com|mailto:,Paul.Mifsud@mlb.com][,Garrett.Horan@mlb.com|mailto:,Garrett.Horan@mlb.com][,matthew.salvatore@mlb.com|mailto:,matthew.salvatore@mlb.com][,rreuter@lbisoftware.com|mailto:,rreuter@lbisoftware.com]

Please create a new Major League Inactive List called "Administrative Leave List" 

Players on this list will be removed from the Active and Reserve List limits but will continue to receive MLS (and salary) while on this list (unless placed on list while on Optional Assignment).

title: As EBIS Admin, I would like updates made to the Player Options Report
custom_preconds:
AC:
 - Remove Waivers Required As Of column
 - Add a Days Accrued in Current Season column
  -- This will display the number of MJ Service Days the player accrued in the current season
 - Add a Option Charge in Current Season
  -- This will be a Y/N colum
  -- If the player was optioned during the current season, display Y
  -- If the player was not optioned during the current season, display N

title: INC0179369 - As a MNC Admin, I want Date to be required on the Life Insurance Consent Form to be required if the player signs the form
custom_preconds:
AC:
 - When a player signs the Life Insurance Consent form, the date field will become required

NOTE: If we are not able to have conditionally required fields in esign, we should explore options to avoid having players submit signed forms with a blank date (this renders them invalid and the entire contract needs to be esigned again)
  -- Other options may include populating it with the MNC Signing Date
